message:
Shibir offers felicitations on the 1st founding anniversary of SA TV:


Bangladesh Islami Chhatrashibir offered sincere felicitations to SA TV family on its 1st founding anniversary.

A delegation headed by the Central Assistant Publicity Secretary of Chhatrashibir Jamal Uddin met the SA Television authority and formally offered felicitations at 12:00 pm today. Other Shibir leaders were present at this time. Shibir leaders wished this private TV channel all-out success and hoped it present ‘truth’ before nation by airing factual news.

BANGLADESH ISLAMI CHHATRASHIBIR
